title: Advanced Music Theory Learning Design: Multimodal Online Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Music Theory and Instrument Performance Experience
context.additional_context: Application of multimodal design principles in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, considering learner control tendencies (Internal/External)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze Mars progression patterns through audio and visual representations and interpret them with 85% accuracy.
Learners can define music terminology (e.g., dominant, subdominant) by connecting auditory/visual cues within 3 seconds.
Learners can autonomously select and develop utilization strategies for multimodal (AI/TI/AIT) learning materials based on situational contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
